TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit GeneralTransform3D extends System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable implements class System.IFormattable
Public MustInherit Class GeneralTransform3D Inherits Animatable Implements IFormattable
public ref class GeneralTransform3D abstract : System::Windows::Media::Animation::Animatable, IFormattable
type GeneralTransform3D = class inherit Animatable interface IFormattable

Docs.summary: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Transformations between 3-D objects take place through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A> methods, both of which return a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> object. In the case that the transformation between the 3-D objects may be represented by a 4x4 matrix, the methods return an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class. The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Clone%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D CloneCurrentValue() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable clone of this object, making deep copies of this object's current values. Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
Docs.returns: A modifiable clone of the current object. The cloned object's property is even if the source's property is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object). For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.CloneCurrentValue%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).

Public MustOverride Function TransformBounds (rect As Rect3D) As Rect3D

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
Docs.returns: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed .

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool TryTransform(valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D inPoint, [out] valuetype System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D& result) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function TryTransform (inPoint As Point3D, ByRef result As Point3D) As Boolean
public: abstract bool TryTransform(System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Point3D inPoint, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::Windows::Media::Media3D::Point3D % result);
abstract member TryTransform : System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D * Point3D -> bool

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.TryTransform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
